name: Minimization Protocol
description:
I didn't accomplish everything I wanted to with this game, and it may be a bit broken, but it is a finished product. I'll probably revamp it completely after the jam ends.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Left Click to Shoot

Made for the Newbie Game Jam 2022.

Music made by: https://sodaguyz.itch.io/

Background created with: https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator
